cast.name: 罗扎·奥古努斯提 Roza Anagnosti

director.name: 奇米特尔·奥古努斯提 Dhimiter Anagnosti

introduction: 1979年意大利Giffoni青年电影节评委会特别奖。1980年意大利萨累诺国际电影节最佳导演奖。导演Dhimiter Anagnosti的另一部经典作品。at the Cinematografic Institute VGIK in Moscow, Russia. Started working as a cinematographer at the Film Studio "New Albania" with the feature "Debatic" 1961. His first movie as a director was "The commissar of light", 1966 together with Viktor Gjika. During his carrier realized also several documentaries but Anagnosti will be known as the best Albanian director for the feature. "A tale from the past" (1987) wins the first prize at International Film Festival, Bondy, France. "Ne shtepine tone" ( 1979) is winner of the special prize in the Giffoni International Film Festival, Italy. "Red poppies on the wall" (1976) Golden Medal in the Giffoni International Film Festival, Italy. Anagnosti is also awarded with many other national recognitions.
